title: Saudi Arabia launches camel passport: Digital system to track ownership and trade
summary_full: Saudi Arabia has launched a new digital Camel Passport initiative to bring order and traceability to its camel sector. This system creates official identities for registered camels, linking ownership, health records, and breed information to enhance regulation, veterinary services, and market confidence.
